attributes.action: I want a Vote on too much immigration
attributes.background: I want them to restrict immigration to trades that are needed like the Australian immigration system unlike what we have had for decades of unlimited low skilled immigration

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what changes you'd like the Government or Parliament to make to the current immigration system - for example whether you'd like to change the eligibility for the skilled worker visa, or whether you'd like to stop people being able to come to the UK on other types of visa. 

You can find more information about the type of visas here: https://www.gov.uk/browse/visas-immigration/work-visas

You can read more about eligibility for the skilled worker visa here: https://www.gov.uk/skilled-worker-visa

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what specific change you would like the Government or Parliament to make to the UK's visa or immigration system.
